name: Sleepy Sheep (Shoddy Games)
description:
Introducing "Sleepy Sheep" - a whimsical, fast-paced  space adventure where you take on the role of a cosmic shepherd. Your mission? Guide your adorable, sleepy flock of sheep across vibrant rainbow bridges and ever-shifting cloud platforms, all while navigating the perils of outer space and the enchanting realms beyond.

The game is currently a very early prototype, any feedback at this point is much appreciated! There's minimal gameplay and only 2 levels, but more will be added over the coming weeks/months

Controls

Left click to move

Right click to “whistle” and collect sheep

Escape - pause

R - restart level
